sentences.sContent: Since we shared the same body-building class, I have been treating you as one of my good friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since we shared the same body-building class, I have been treating you as one of my good friends.
sentences.sCn: 自从我们上了健身俱乐部的课以后，我就一直把你当成好朋友。

sentences.sContent: People are now attaching greater importance to quality of life, with travel, body-building and beauty treatment becoming an indispensable part of their concerns.
sentences.sContent_eng: People are now attaching greater importance to quality of life, with travel, body-building and beauty treatment becoming an indispensable part of their concerns.
sentences.sCn: 人们越来越看重生活品质，旅游、健身、美容等休闲活动已成为人们生活中不可缺少的部分。

trans.tranOther: Bodybuilding is the activity of doing special exercises regularly in order to make your muscles grow bigger
